name: R
description: A software environment for statistical computing and graphics

name: ineq
description: Provides metrics for inequality, concentration and poverty

name: fpc
description: Provides clustering and cluster validation methods

name: multcomp
description: Provides simultaneous tests and confidence intervals for general linear hypotheses in parametric models, including linear, generalized linear, linear mixed effects, and survival models.

name: FactoMineR
description: Provides dimmentionality reduction methods including pincipal component analysis (PCA)

name: vegan
description: Provides ordination methods, diversity analysis and other tools for microbial ecology

name: sva
description: Provides functions for removing batch effects and other unwanted variation in high-throughput sequencing experiments

name: optparse
description: Provides a command line option parser

name: igraph
description: Provides tools for graphs and network analysis

name: fossil
description: Provides functions for estimating species richness in microbial ecology

name: coin
description: Provides conditional inference procedures for the general independence problem including two-sample, K-sample (non-parametric ANOVA), correlation, censored, ordered and multivariate problems

name: SNFtool
description: Provides tolls for similarity network fusion (SNF)
